title: Early collection of ballots
context: §11-135 Early collection of ballots. In an electronic ballot system election the chief election officer may authorize collection of voted ballots before the closing of the polls in order to facilitate the counting of ballots; provided that the voted ballots shall be returned to the counting center in sealed ballot boxes. [L 1970, c 26, pt of §2; am L 1973, c 217, §1(pp); am L 1975, c 36, §1(9); am L 1980, c 264, §1(l); am L 1983, c 34, §18]
